summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing arrangements for a visit to St. Thomas, including transportation and amenities available to Staley. Epstein mentions his ownership of marinas and offers various recreational activities.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing arrangements for Jes Staley's visit to St. Thomas.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, invited by Epstein to visit St. Thomas and offered various amenities.

connections.description: Epstein invites Staley to St. Thomas and offers him various recreational activities and accommodations.

keyFacts: Epstein offers Staley a car and driver for his visit to St. Thomas.
Epstein mentions that he owns two marinas in St. Thomas.
He offers recreational activities such as ATV rides, jet skiing, and gym access.
Epstein indicates that he can organize a harbor at Norman Island and lunch at Guana.
The email contains a confidentiality notice suggesting it may be privileged communication.
